column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
Used to acquire the current operation mode setting (i.e. “automatic,” “cooling,” “heating,” “dehumidification” or “air circulator”).
column4: The following values shall be used: Automatic: 0x41 Cooling: 0x42 Heating: 0x43 Dehumidification: 0x44 Air circulator: 0x45

column2: Rated power consumption of outdoor unit
column3: Used to acquire the rated power consumption for the cooling, heating and dehumidification modes.

column2: Measured electric current consumption of outdoor unit
column3: Used to acquire the measured electric current consumption.
Used to acquire the measured temperature of the outdoor air.
This property indicates when the air conditioner is in the “special” state (i.e. “defrosting” state).
Used to acquire the operation status (i.e. ON or OFF) of the compressor.
Used to acquire the current operation mode (i.e. “cooling,” “heating,” “dehumidification” or “other”).
Used to acquire the rotation speed of the fan of the outdoor unit (expressed in %).

column2: Measured power consumption of outdoor unit
column3: Used to acquire the measured power consumption of the outdoor unit.
Used to acquire the measured temperature of the outdoor air.
